1 import numpy as np
2 
3 
4 def poseToArrays(pose):
5  """
6  Converts geometry_msg/Pose to position and orientation numpy arrays for
7  subsequent operations
8  """
9  a1 = pose.position.x
10  a2 = pose.position.y
11  a3 = pose.position.z
12  pos = np.array([a1, a2, a3])
13  a4 = pose.orientation.x
14  a5 = pose.orientation.y
15  a6 = pose.orientation.z
16  a7 = pose.orientation.w
17  orient = np.array([a4, a5, a6, a7])
18  return pos, orient
19 
20 def isPoseClose(currentPose, targetPose, posTol=0.002, orientTol=0.005):
21  """
22  Compares two poses for closesness within specified position and
23  orientation tolerances
24  """
25  pos1, orient1 = poseToArrays(currentPose)
26  pos2, orient2 = poseToArrays(targetPose)
27  matchPose = np.allclose(pos1, pos2, atol=posTol)
28  matchOrient = np.allclose(np.abs(orient1), np.abs(orient2), atol=orientTol)
29  match = matchPose and matchOrient
30  if match:
31  msg = f"[Success] Current pose matches the Target pose {targetPose}"
32  else:
33  msg = f"[Error] Current pose {currentPose} does not match the Target pose {targetPose}"
34  return match, msg
